EmailTemplate.name: EDUT - Close Ticket - With Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: [EDUT] Ticket# {!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your recent inquiry to the Nokia Global Contact Center. Our team has completed work on your issue and we will now close the ticket. We hope that you have had a positive experience with the Global Contact Center.
Please take a moment to answer a short survey about the assistance you received for this issue. Simply click on this survey link {!Case.CH_Invitation_Link__c} to access the short questionnaire. Your feedback will help us improve our service and we appreciate the time you take to respond.
If you have additional questions regarding this ticket or require further assistance, please feel free to e-mail the NokiaEDU Global Contact Center through gcc.nokiaedu@nokia.com.
It is our pleasure to assist you with your learning.
Kind Regards,
NokiaEDU Global Contact Center
